BackstoryDef.title: Draconic Noble
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into an ancient noble lineage that carried the blood of dragons. From childhood, [PAWN_pronoun] exhibited extraordinary strength and resilience, and was trained in both combat arts and the management of draconic power.\n\nDespite [PAWN_possessive] noble status, [PAWN_pronoun] was drawn to the martial path, spending more time in the training grounds than in courtly halls.

BackstoryDef.title: BloodThorn Knight
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a legendary BloodThorn Knight after mastering the forbidden fusion of vampiric blood magic and draconic power. [PAWN_pronoun] fought in countless wars, earning both fear and reverence across the lands.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] can manipulate blood essence to unleash devastating combat techniques, heal wounds with supernatural speed, and withstand attacks that would kill lesser warriors. However, this power comes with a curse - [PAWN_pronoun] must constantly maintain [PAWN_possessive] blood essence or face dire consequences.

BackstoryDef.title: Vampiric Progenitor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: During a fatal battle, [PAWN_nameDef] was on the brink of death when [PAWN_possessive] dormant vampiric bloodline awakened. [PAWN_pronoun] became a progenitor vampire, gaining immortality and regenerative powers beyond mortal comprehension.\n\nThis transformation merged with [PAWN_possessive] draconic heritage, creating a unique hybrid capable of feats thought impossible.

BackstoryDef.title: War Commander
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] led armies across countless battlefields, known for [PAWN_possessive] tactical brilliance and unstoppable combat prowess. [PAWN_pronoun] earned the title of BloodThorn Knight through countless victories, leaving battlefields stained crimson.
